backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, and confidence metadata for the romantic gift experience.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of key frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup and global CSS variables defining color themes, styles, and layout rules including dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the full-screen GiftExperience scene.
frontend/src/components/GiftExperience.t: Controls the full animation sequence, speech triggers, and user interactions for the gift experience.
frontend/src/components/HeartField.tsx: Generates and animates floating heart elements across the background.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that initializes and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management via React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for backend-related React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook wrapping SpeechSynthesis with autoplay detection, fallback handling, and voice selection.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables for light/dark modes, global styles, and custom keyframe animations for gift, character, and heart effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, extended theme options, plugins, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including goals, features, architecture notes, required assets, and version info.
